summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2935, for the improvement of the alley in block 47, J. H. Nagle's Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley between Harvard Avenue North and North Broadway, from East Denny Way to East John Street. All in the City of Seattle, by grading the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 35437 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
